title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Hikaru Inochi Chronicle U.C.
synopsis: As the Turn A Gundam's Moonlight Butterfly begins to reduce civilization to dust, the ghosts of Amuro Ray and Lalah Sun look back on the history of the Universal Century.
